snippet.title: Jack B. Nimble Teaser - iOS (iPhone, iPad)
snippet.description:
Teaser trailer for Jack B. Nimble. Available on iPhone and iPad.

Latest release coming to the iOS App Store on 26.04.17: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/jack-b-nimble/id918891211?mt=8

THE GAME

Jump in the shoes of Jack B. Nimble and master the whip in this cute, retro auto runner. Leap and dash across spooky hilltops, gothic cityscapes, dank dungeons and more! Whip candles to multiply your score, and use your environment to slow down and stay in control of the action; but watch out for obstacles that block your path! With a score system based on player accuracy and distance travelled, timing and skill are key to achieving a position atop the leaderboard. Are you nimble enough?

FEATURES

- High speed side-scrolling action
- Authentic retro Game Boy era visuals
- Accessible single input control scheme - just jump and whip!
- 8 characters to choose from and 6 endless, increasingly difficult levels to master
- Thumping chip tune soundtrack by Barry "Epoch" Topping
- Prove your skill with Game Center leaderboards and achievements!

SOUNDTRACK

Available here: https://nostoppingepoch.bandcamp.com/album/jack-b-nimble-original-soundtrack

SOCIAL

Web - http://jackbnimblegame.com
Twitter - https://twitter.com/jackbnimblegame
Tumblr - https://jackbnimblegame.tumblr.com
Facebook - https://facebook.com/jackbnimblegame
